Claim: "Most of the bubbles are dissolving in the water."
Implication: "Methane levels at the surface are four to eight times what would normally be expected and this is venting into the atmosphere."
Referring expressions: Most of the bubbles, water  Methane levels, surface, atmosphere
Formula: ( Most of the bubbles are dissolving in the water.) -> (exists c (exists d (IsFourToEightTimes(c) and IsVenting(d))))
